Job Description: Prepare and analyses financial statement;
Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and bank reconciliations;

Ability to interpret and analyze financial statements and periodicals

Willing to join as soon as possible.

Job Description: Consolidating employee needs plans in each division and setting priorities according to company needs, so that important priority positions can be filled quickly.

Planning an assessment implementation strategy for both the need for new employee recruitment, as well as promotions to ensure that the assessment process is carried out effectively in supporting the company's business development.

Carry out the recruitment process for prospective employees in the company with the methods/tools that have been determined to ensure the employees who are accepted have the quality and competence in accordance with the needs of the position they occupy.
Develop and analyze the methods/too/s used in the recruitment process, to ensure the methods/too/s used are effective in identifying the potential, competence and quality of employees.

Carry out the employee assessment process with the right method/too/s in accordance with company policies and procedures and analyze the results obtained in order to assist the company in identifying potential employees.
Ensure that all administration related to the assessment process is available and complete in order to implement compliance with company policies.
Provide opinions, suggestions, and assistance to users related to the results of employee assessments, to assist users in understanding the results of employee assessments in their work units.

Ensure the process and quality of the assessment results are in accordance with the company's needs and always know the latest information about assessment practices in the market in order to improve the quality of assessment in the company.
Criteria: Bachelor degree in Psychology are welcome to apply
Have min 5 years of working experience in both Recruitment
Advanced skill in candidate sourcing, assessment, interviewing & salary negotiation
Having experience in handling Mass Recruitment & role as HR Business Partner will be an advantage
Good communication, influencing skill, and interpersonal skill
Good analytical thinking, problem solving, and decision making

title: IT WMS SOA and Implementation Support

Analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work on own initiative
Ability to influence and negotiate effectively
Able to use MS Excel (filtering, sorting, basic formulas such as vlookup)
Knowledge on SQL Script & VBA is a plus

Job Description: Develop a recruitment management strategy in the company based on the long-term and short-term strategies that have been determined.
Prepare work plans and budgets related to recruitment management to ensure the achievement of the expected strategic targets.

Ensuring that the entire process of recruitment, assessment, placement, promotion, transfer to employee resignation is carried out in accordance with the policies and procedures applicable in the company.
Provide recommendations to users related to the recruitment and placement process to ensure users have the right considerations in determining the prospective employee to be accepted and placed.

Advanced skill in candidate sourcing, assessment, interviewing & salary negotiation
Having experience in handling Mass Recruitment & role as HR Business Partner will be an advantage
Good communication, influencing skill, and interpersonal skill
Good analytical thinking, problem solving, and decision making

Strong communication, good negotiating skill
Good analytical, creative, and good information monitoring, and formal presentation

Job Description: Execute operational tasks to be done to launch new dark stores.
